query:
SELECT 
  'posInvoices' as tbl, 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  COUNT(DISTINCT branchId) as branches,
  COUNT(DISTINCT employeeId) as employees
FROM posInvoices
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'posInvoiceItems',
  COUNT(*),
  0,
  0
FROM posInvoiceItems;
